Text:
function RIR_EP05_14()
    -- .転-3【2月第4週】「女の子じゃないから恥ずかしくないもん！」
    SaveData.Title = "女の子じゃないから恥ずかしくないもん！"

    -- //BG：病院の廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG010aa")

    PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    -- //BU：アキラ・私服（笑顔）、リラ・私服（焦り）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02eb")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR03ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[It was about one week before the Princess Election――
姫選挙まで残り一週間を迎えようとしていた頃――]])

    MSG([[Finally permitted to walk around the hospital, I tried to go to the shop alone, watched over by Lira and Akira.
ようやく院内の歩行を許可されたボクは、リラさんやアキラに見守られつつ、一人で歩いて売店に行こうとしていた。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ka")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1025.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "You're good at walking<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> You're good at walking<sprite="Emoji" name="note">"
「あんよは上手<sprite="Emoji" name="note">　あんよは上手<sprite="Emoji" name="note">」]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1231.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
 "M-maybe you should still practice in the rehab room? Your legs are shaking, you know?"
「ま、まだリハビリ室で練習を続けてた方がいいんじゃない？　足震えてるよ？」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1635.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "I-I'm fine!"
「だ、大丈夫！」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[I was dressed as a girl just in case I might run into anyone from Yuriai Private Academy.
いつ百合愛学園の皆さんと鉢合わせてもいいように、万が一のために女装中だ。]])

    MSG([[Because of that, as I walked through the hospital, attention naturally began to gather.
そのためか、院内を歩いていると、自然と視線が集まり始めた。]])

    -- //BU：モブ男性×３
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ill-man_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
【Man in hospital gown】
 "That girl came again today. Ah... what beautiful legs..."
「今日も来たよ、あの子。ああ……なんてキレイな足なんだ……」]])

PLAY_VOICE("ill-man_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
【Man in hospital gown】
 "The moment she falls, I help her up. The moment she falls, I help her up. The moment she falls, I help her up."
「転んだ瞬間に助け起こす。転んだ瞬間に助け起こす。転んだ瞬間に助け起こす」]])

PLAY_VOICE("ill-man_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
【Man in hospital gown】
 "Step aside. I'm the one who's going to get close to her."
「引っ込んでな。あの子とお近づきになるのはオレだ」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    -- //BU：アキラ・私服（笑顔）、リラ・私服（焦り）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR03ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1232.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
 "Hey, hey, hey! Don't stare at someone else's lover like that!"
「コラコラコラー！　ヒトの恋人をジロジロと見るなっつーの！」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1636.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "Now, now. I guess being hospitalized makes people restless, so it can't be helped."
「まぁまぁ。入院中はモヤモヤするらしいし仕方ないよ」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1637.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "I'm a guy, and the only skin showing is my legs, so it's okay to be looked at a bit."
「ボクは男だし、肌が見えているのは足だけだし、ちょっと見られるくらい平気だからさ」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1233.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
 "Eh!? But those looks are obviously inappropriate... Or is it appropriate because it's between guys? No, no, no!"
「え！？　いや、だって明らかに視線が不健全だし……いや男同士だから健全なの？　いやいやいや！」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR03da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1234.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
 "No way! Aaargh~~~~~~"
「そんなワケないし！　くぁ～～～～～」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ka")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1026.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "Hehe, having a cross-dressing guy as a boyfriend must be tough, huh."
「ふふ、女装男子を彼氏に持つと大変ですねぇ」]])

    MSG([[Akira enjoyed watching Lira, who held her head in frustration.
頭を抱えるリラさんを、アキラは愉しげに見守っていた。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR03ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1235.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
 "No way! Those guys might try to cozy up to us eventually! Let's move fast, Erika!"
「やっぱりムリ！　アイツらそのうち仲良くなろうと擦り寄ってくるかもしれないもん！　早く移動するよ、エリカ！」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1638.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "W-wait!"
「わわわっ」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[Lira grabbed my hand and pulled me forward, causing my legs to stumble――
リラさんがボクの手をひぱって前に進もうとしたため、足がもつれて――]])

    STOP_BGM(1000)

    -- //SE：身体のぶつかる音
    PLAY_SE("SEa034.wav")
    WAIT(200)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG010ae")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    -- //BU：リラ・私服（驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_RIR03ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[I crashed face-first into Lira's chest.
リラさんの胸に顔面から突っ込んでしまった。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_RIR03ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM01.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1236.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
 "I-idiot... Where are you sticking your face in front of people...?"
「ば、バカ……人前でどど、どこに顔を突っ込んでるの……」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1639.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "S-s-sorry..."
「ごごご、ごめんなさい……」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG010aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：ウラン（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[Just then, Uran appeared at an inconvenient moment.
そこで折り悪くウランさんが現れる。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02oa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0457.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "Oh my~"
「あら～」]])

    -- //CI:一句詠むウラン・継続 139
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI139a")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0458.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "<r=め>A girl</r> is a blessing, I believe, and to think pure white lilies <r=けが>are not stained</r>"
「<r=め>女</r>の子をば　恵みとぞ思ふ　白百合の　<r=けが>汚</r>らふことも なしと思へば」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1640.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "P-please don't compose a poem about us!"
「わ、私たちで一句詠まないでください！」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    STOP_BGM(1000)
    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask017" , 1000,false)

    -- //BG：病室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask017" , 1000,false)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    -- //BU：ウラン・私服（笑顔）、リラ・私服・（通常）、アキラ・私服（ニヤリ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI02ka")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[After finishing shopping at the store, we returned to the ward and received a pleasant proposal from Uran.
売店での買い物を終えて病室に戻ったボクたちは、ウランさんから嬉しい提案をもらうことになった。]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0459.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "I have officially decided to express my support for Lira."
「わたくしは正式に、リラさんの支持を表明することにいたしましたわ」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1641.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "Thank you. Having Uran on our side is truly reassuring. Please continue to support us."
「ありがとうございます。ウランさんが味方になってくださるなんて、本当に心強いですよ」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0460.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "What are you saying? Lira, like Erika, considers the conservatives as well."
「何をおっしゃるのですか。リラさんもエリカさんと同様に、保守派のことも考えてくださる方」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02oa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0461.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "More than anything... I see you two as comrades who believe 'women with women' is wholesome. We must destroy the co-ed faction that stands in your way."
「それに何より……『女性同士』こそ健全と考える仲間とお見受けしておりますわ。お二人の契りを阻む共学派は滅ぼさなければなりません」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1642.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "Eh...? W-women with women, you mean..."
「え……！？　じょ、女性同士って、まさか」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR03ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1237.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
 "U-Uran senpai, well, our relationship is probably a bit different from what you think..."
「ウ、ウラン先輩、あのね、アタシたちの関係はきっと先輩の考えているモノとは微妙に違くて……」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02oa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0462.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "Yes, yes. You needn't say more. Your gazes, expressions, and touches speak volumes."
「ええ、ええ。皆まで言わずとも結構でございますわ。お二人の視線、表情、触れ合いを見ていればよぉく伝わりますとも」]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0463.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "I am your comrade. I respect the bond between two women and wish to enlighten everyone on this."
「わたくしはお二人の同志。女性であるお二人の心の繋がりを尊び、皆様に啓蒙していきたいと考えておりますわ」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI02ka")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1027.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "So, that means 'women with women', huh."
「つまり、『女性同志』というワケですなぁ」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1238.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
 "A~kira<sprite="Emoji" name="note">"
「ア～キラ<sprite="Emoji" name="note">」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI02da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1028.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
 "N-no, no! Don't poke my cheeks~!"
「いひゃい、いひゃい！
    　ほっぺひゃちゅねらにゃいで～！」]])

    MSG([[Whatever her motive, having Uran officially on our side was a great relief.
動機はどうあれ、ウランさんが正式に味方についてもらえるのは何よりありがたい。]])

    MSG([[Combining Uran’s and my faction accounts for 40%.
ウランさんとボクの派閥は合わせて４割。]])

    MSG([[Considering Daria’s faction is in chaos without its leader, it’s not a dream for Lira to get over half the votes.
ダリアさんの派閥がトップの不在で混乱していることを考えれば、リラさんが過半数の票を獲得することは決して夢じゃない話だ。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1643.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "I can't explain the details yet, but we have an absolute reason why we must win the Princess Election."
「詳しくはまだお話できないのですが、私たちには絶対に姫皇選挙で勝たないといけない理由があるんです」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1644.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "Having Uran as an ally is truly helpful. Once again, please support us."
「ウランさんが味方してくださるのは……本当に助かりますよ。改めて、ぜひよろしくお願いします」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0464.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "Hehe, seeing Lira's hard work at the academy clearly shows how serious she is about the election."
「ふふ、リラさんの学園での奮闘を見ていれば、どれだけ姫皇選挙に本気か伝わってきますよ」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0465.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "From the tea ceremony club I belong to, to visiting clubs daily to build connections, I see it all."
「わたくしの所属する茶道部を筆頭に、学内の部活動に毎日お邪魔しては、交流を図ってらっしゃいますよね」]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0466.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "The interference from Hermes-sama’s 'knights' seems tough, but if I can help, please let me know."
「エルメスさまの『騎士』たちからの妨害はいつも大変そうですが、わたくしにできることがあれば何でも言ってくださいましね」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR03ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1239.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
 "U-Uran senpai, about that"
「う、ウラン先輩、その話は」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1645.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "Interference? What’s that?"
「妨害？　何ですか、それ」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[Hearing this for the first time, I unintentionally looked at Lira.
初めて聞く話題に、思わずリラさんの顔を見た。]])

    MSG([[Lira averted her eyes awkwardly. Just from that, I understood the situation wasn't good.
リラさんが気まずそうに顔を逸らす。
    　それだけで、状況が芳しくないことはよくわかった。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0467.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "You've heard from Lira, right? She’s been constantly nagged by Hermes-sama’s 'knights' this past week."
「リラさんから伺っているでしょう？　リラさんはこの一週間、いつもエルメスさまの『騎士』にやっかみを言われているのです」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02fc")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0468.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "Seeing her skillfully handle upperclassmen, anyone would want to be on her side."
「上級生たちを相手どって華麗に立ち回る様子を拝見していれば、誰しも味方になりたいと考えますわ」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1646.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "............"
「…………」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[I hadn’t paid enough attention. Now that I think about it, interference was inevitable.
ボクの注意が足らなかった。
    　よくよく考えれば、妨害などあって当然。]])

    MSG([[Lira never showed even a hint that she was dealing with it.
リラさんはそうした妨害に対処していることを、おくびにも出さずにいてくれたんだ。]])

    MSG([[No need to ask why. It was obviously not to worry me.
何故かは聞くまでもない。
    　ボクを心配させないために決まっている。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1647.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 (I have no right to blame Lira.)
（ボクに、リラさんを責める権利なんてないよね）]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[Until recently, I had been carrying my problems alone without consulting Lira.
ついこの前まで、ボクはリラさんに相談も抜きで、一人で問題を抱え込んでいた。]])

    MSG([[Akira said, 'She’s feeling the same way,' and that couldn't be more accurate.
アキラが『彼女だって同じ気持ち』になると言っていたけれど、まさしくドンピシャな結果となったと言える。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR03fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1240.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
 "That kind of interference is nothing. I have Hiyu and many others on my side."
「あんな妨害、全然へっちゃらだよ。アタシにはヒユや他のみんな、他にもたくさん味方がいるからね」]])

    MSG([[Sensing my worries, Lira spoke brightly.
ボクの心配を察してか、リラさんが明るく語る。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR03eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1241.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
 "Erika, just focus on healing your injury. Whether you can show your face before the Princess Election might change the outcome."
「エリカは自分の怪我を治すのに集中すればいいの。姫皇選挙の前にアンタが顔を出せるかどうかで、結果は変わるかもしれないし」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0469.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "Exactly. If we can draw the remaining 10% of votes from Hermes-sama, Lira will win, but that 10% is a formidable, solid wall."
「そうですね。残り１割の支持をエルメスさまから引き込めればリラさんの勝ちですが、その１割の壁はあまりにも高く、堅牢です」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0470.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
 "If the three of us 'Princesses' don’t unite, preserving Yuriai Private Academy’s traditions will be difficult."
「我々三人の『姫』が一致団結しなければ、百合愛学園の伝統を守り抜くことを難しいでしょう」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1648.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
 "Yes, I will definitely be ready by the day of the Princess Election. And I will surely lead Lira to victory!"
「ええ、必ず姫皇選挙の当日には間に合わせてみせます。そしてリラさんを勝利に導いてみせます！」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[The situation still heavily favors Hermes. How much we can raise support in the remaining week—that's the key to victory.
